question: What should I do if I experience a change in income or another change in circumstance during the year?
text:
What should I do if I experience a change in income or another change in circumstance during the year?
          
        
(Desplazarse hacia abajo para ver Preguntas Ms Frecuentes en Espaol)
Your life might change over the coming year. For example, you might get married, have a child, or your income might change.
If information from your application changes during the year, you must go into your
Virginia's Insurance Marketplace
account and report a change within 30 days of the event so you can continue to receive the correct amount of financial assistance to help pay for health coverage and care.
Changes may affect your eligibility for:
Financial assistance to help pay for coverage.

Cost-sharing reductions
that lower your copayments, coinsurance, and deductibles
Coverage through
Medicaid or the Family Access to Medical Insurance Security Plan (FAMIS)

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________
